title: Two Chalet School Girls in India
description: Two Chalet School Girls in India details the time spent by Joey and the Robin in India. Elinor M. Brent-Dyer's original manuscript for this title was never published but it has been faithfully reimagined by Priyadarshini Narendra. It covers some of the time between The New Chalet School and The Chalet School in Exile.
author: Priyadarshini Narendra
